element.name: sirendec
element.description: Decode streams encoded with the Siren7 codec into 16bit PCM
element.author: Youness Alaoui <kakaroto@kakaroto.homelinux.net>

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, width=(int)16, depth=(int)16, endianness=(int)1234, signed=(boolean)true, rate=(int)16000, channels=(int)1

element.name: sirenenc
element.description: Encode 16bit PCM streams into the Siren7 codec
element.author: Youness Alaoui <kakaroto@kakaroto.homelinux.net>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, width=(int)16, depth=(int)16, endianness=(int)1234, signed=(boolean)true, rate=(int)16000, channels=(int)1
